content:
ForteBank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 2800.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 1789.22 billion KZT (63.9% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 2214.31 billion KZT (79.1% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 44.14 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 13.14%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 1.58%
- Net Interest Margin: 4.69%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 19.03% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 15.89%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 4.10%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 115.6%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 42.5%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 149.8%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 128.8%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 80.8%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

ForteBank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 147 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 735 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 916
- Employee Count: 3,087 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 565,433 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 339,259 (60.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 15,507
- Corporate Clients: 28,271
- Retail Clients: 537,161

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 379373
- Active Mobile Users: 223,141
- Online Transactions Volume: 10.0 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 83.3% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.5/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 985,880 total cards
- Credit Cards: 211,207
- Debit Cards: 460,359
- Active Loan Accounts: 112,875
- Deposit Accounts: 502,968

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 233 per day
- Average Service Time: 6.8 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 58
- Employee Productivity Index: 85.9%

ForteBank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

ForteBank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 19.13%
- Market Share by Loans: 20.52%
- Market Share by Deposits: 18.31%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #3

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 9.7%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 14.9%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 14.7%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 13.7%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 14.3%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Largest branch network nationwide with comprehensive coverage
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Trusted brand with 25+ years of market presence

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 19.00 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 955.90 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 1221.45 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 16.80 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 720.72 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 707.41 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 8.29 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 184.52 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 80,935

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Network optimization and digital transformation
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- Customer experience improvement across all channels
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
ForteBank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
